title: OJOsoft VOB Converter 2.6.3.0304-serials incl(archive your dvds)
description:
About OJOsoft VOB Converter

OJOsoft VOB Converter is designed for backing up your favorite DVD movies and videos to your computer by converting VOB files to AVI, MPEG, MPG, WMV, MP4, MOV, 3GP/3G2, H.264, ASF, FLV etc. Also, it can help you convert to VOB from any video format.

Besides, it also allows you to convert VOB to MP3 audio format.

OJOsoft VOB Converter can be used like VOB to iPod converter, VOB to iPhone converter, VOB to Apple TV converter, VOB to 3GP converter, VOB to PSP converter, and VOB to Zune converter.

OJOsoft VOB Converter Supports all the key formats!
Supported Source File Formats to VOB format
						
				
				
	
Video Formats 	3GP/3GPP, 3G2/3GP2, MJPEG, AVI, DivX, Xvid, MPG, MPEG(MPEG-1/2), DAT, FLV, MKV(Matroska), QuickTime(MOV,QT), MP4, M4V, VOB, WMV, ASF, TS, MPEG-4 AVC, DVR-MS, H.263, H.264, X.264
	
						
				
		
Supported Target File Formats from VOB format
						
				
				
	
Video Formats 	MP4, MOV, 3GP, 3G2, MPEG, MPG, VOB, AVI, ASF, WMV, FLV, H.264, MJPEG
Audio Formats 	MP3
Portable Players 	Sony PSP, Apple iPod nano/video/classic/touch/TV Out, Apple TV, iPhone, Zune, Archos AV 500/700, Archos Gmini402, Creative Zen Vision, iriver PMP-100
	
						
				
		
What can OJOsoft VOB Converter do for you?
Convert VOB files to AVI

This best VOB converter can help you convert VOB to AVI format with three easy steps.
Convert VOB to MPEG

This VOB converter supports converting VOB files to MPEG format with super fast speed and great quality.
AVI to VOB Converter

It helps you convert to VOB from AVI file easy and fast.
Convert VOB files to MPG

Enjoy your favorite MPG files by converting VOB files to MPG format.
Convert VOB to WMV

This amazing VOB converter can convert VOB files to Windows Media Video.
Convert VOB files to MP4

Enjoy your favorite MP4 files on your portable players by converting VOB files to MP4.
Convert VOB to MOV

Convert VOB files to MOV format with three easy steps.
Convert VOB files to MPEG2

It helps you convert VOB files to MPEG2 files with easiest procedures.
Convert to VOB from WMV

This amazing VOB converter can help you convert to VOB format from Windows Media Video.
Features of OJOsoft VOB Converter

    * Support converting VOB files to various video and audio formats
    * Support batch conversion with a task list
    * Support converting any video format to VOB format
    * Unmatchable converting speed, wonderful output quality
    * Windows Vista supported
    * Have option to select video size, bit rate, NTSC/PAL, frame rate, audio codec, sample rate etc
    * So easy to modify the name and path of output files
    * When converting files, you can pause, stop and continue at any moment
    * With the user- friendly interface, OJOsoft VOB Converter is suited for both veterans and beginners you can complete your conversion as easy as 1-2-3
    * All decoders and encoders are built in. Once you download and install OJOsoft VOB Converter, all supported formats can be converted without downloading any more codec
    * Safe to install and viruses-free. We respect your privacy. So there are no spyware and adware in OJOsoft VOB Converter

System Requirements for OJOsoft VOB Converter
Minimum System Requirements

OS : Microsoft Windows XP
RAM : 128M
CPU : Intel/AMD compatible at 750 MHz or above
Recommended System Requirements

OS : Microsoft Windows XP/2003/Vista with all latest updates installed
RAM : 512M or higher
CPU : Intel/AMD compatible at 750 MHz or above
